channel.title: Scenarios on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in Scenarios on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: Known Bugs
item.description: Known bugs tests/UI/campaigns/functional/API/02_endpoints/04_hook/02_getAPIHooksId.ts : PrestaShop#34552 : API : Endpoint GET /api/hooks/{id} : Difference between title & name - Enpoint issue tests/UI/campaigns/functional/API/02_endpoints/05_language/01_getAPILanguages.ts : PrestaShop#35860 : International > Languages : Display locale in list & readonly edit tests/UI/campaigns/functional/API/02_endpoints/08_product/01_postAPIProduct.ts : PrestaShop#35619 : Endpoint POST /api/product : Descriptions are not updated tests/UI/campaigns/functional/API/02_endpoints/08_product/04_patchAPIProductId.ts : PrestaShop#35626 : Endpoint PATCH /api/product/{productId} : Type is not updated tests/UI/campaigns/functional/BO/02_orders/01_orders/viewAndEditOrder/11_checkInvoice.ts : PrestaShop#22581 : INVOICE - MAIL / No shop logo on the invoice when you change the port (Docker) tests/UI/campaigns/functional/BO/03_catalog/01_products/22_bulkActionsEnableDisable3DotsButton.
